接口的使用
org.springframework.transaction.support.ResourceHolder

  • 使用ResourceHolder的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.jca.cci.connection
    Provides a utility class for easy ConnectionFactory access, a PlatformTransactionManager for local CCI transactions, and various simple ConnectionFactory proxies/adapters.
    org.springframework.transaction.support
    Support classes for the org.springframework.transaction package.

    • org.springframework.jca.cci.connection中ResourceHolder的使用

      实现ResourceHolder的org.springframework.jca.cci.connection中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ConnectionHolder
      Resource holder wrapping a CCI Connection.

    • org.springframework.transaction.support中ResourceHolder的使用

      类型参数类型为ResourceHolder的org.springframework.transaction.support中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ResourceHolderSynchronization<H extends ResourceHolder,K>
      TransactionSynchronization implementation that manages a ResourceHolder bound through TransactionSynchronizationManager.
      实现ResourceHolder的org.springframework.transaction.support中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ResourceHolderSupport
      Convenient base class for resource holders.
